lessons.title: 1.1 Client-Server Model
lessons.content:
# Becoming a Full Stack Developer

A full stack developer handles both the presentation layer (UI) and the logic layer (Server).

### Key Concepts
- **Frontend**: HTML/CSS/React.
- **Backend**: Node.js/Python/Go.
- **Database**: PostgreSQL/MongoDB.

quizQuestions.text: Which part of the stack is responsible for UI?
quizQuestions.explanation: Frontend is what the user sees and interacts with.
